publisher.publisher-name: Chinese Academy of Mathematices and System Sciences (AMSS) Chinese Academy of Sciences

title-group.article-title: A LOCKING-FREE SCHEME OF NONCONFORMING RECTANGULAR FINITE ELEMENT FOR THE PLANAR ELASTICITY

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2004 AMSS, Chinese Academy of Sciences and VSP

abstract.p: In this paper, the authors present a locking-free scheme of the lowest order nonconforming rectangle finite element method for the planar elasticity with the pure displacement boundary condition. Optimal order error estimate, uniformly for the Lamé constant λ ∊ (0, ∞) is obtained.
